scripts.build:es6: ttsc --build  tsconfig.es6.json && babel build/esm/ -d build/esm/ -s --plugins annotate-pure-calls && build-utils package-esm
scripts.build:post-process: build-utils rewrite-source-maps && build-utils rewrite-locals && yarn prettier:lib
scripts.build: yarn run build:lib && yarn run build:es6 && yarn run build:post-process
scripts.autofix: yarn prettier && yarn lint --fix && yarn prettier
